parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF11240003) at the end. This strongly suggests an intention to engage in electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are typically used by candidates or their representatives in Romania for campaign materials.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>While the post doesn't explicitly mention a specific candidate by name, it heavily implies a negative impact on candidates from the PSD-PNL-USR alliance.  The post focuses on the combined voting power of this alliance and contrasts it with the voting power of other groups, including those who voted for Cǎlin Georgescu. This implicitly encourages voters to support candidates outside this alliance.  This indirectly refers to candidates from the PSD, PNL, and USR parties, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The language used ("Bună dimineața, români!", "voi, cei care ați ieșit la vot", etc.) directly addresses the Romanian population, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to influence voters' choices in the upcoming parliamentary elections.  The post highlights the numerical advantage of the PSD-PNL-USR alliance, urging voters to act to prevent their victory. This clearly aims to sway voters away from the mentioned alliance and towards other candidates, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not adhere to journalistic standards. It lacks objectivity, presents biased information (e.g., the claim about the alliance's voting power and the implied criticism of UDMR), and its primary goal is not to inform but to persuade voters to act in a specific way. It's not a news report or analysis but rather an opinion piece designed to influence the election.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post presents itself as a personal opinion, but its core message is a clear call to action designed to influence the election outcome. The emotional appeal and the explicit call to vote are not consistent with a neutral expression of personal opinion.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1130310645194385</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post, despite being presented as a personal opinion, functions as electoral propaganda. The presence of a CMF number, the targeting of the Romanian population, the clear intention to influence the election outcome by highlighting the numerical advantage of a specific alliance and urging voters to act against it, and the lack of journalistic objectivity all point towards a violation of Article 98 t). The post's content directly aims to influence voters' choices in the parliamentary elections, even if indirectly.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>PSD</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>PNL</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>USR</name><impact>NEGATIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>PNCR</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Pop Sebastian Tiberiu, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 1130310645194385) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care conține propagandă electorală sub forma unui apel la vot împotriva alianței PSD-PNL-USR, evidențiind avantajul numeric al acestei alianțe și îndemnând implicit la votarea altor candidați. Postarea, deși prezentată ca o opinie personală, are un efect electoral clar, vizând influențarea votului prin prezentarea unor informații tendențioase și un apel emoțional la acțiune. Prezența numărului CMF11240003 sugerează o legătură directă cu campania electorală.  Cheltuielile pentru această postare, conform Ad Library, sunt sub 100 RON, dar impactul asupra a 5000-6000 de impresii și o estimare a acoperirii de 100.000-500.000 de persoane, demonstrează potențialul de influențare a votului.  Datele de contact ale advertiserului sunt contact@sebastiantiberiupop.ro și +40760256257.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
